channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-2080] Few code improvements in the ql and serde packages.
item.description:
Few code improvements in the ql and serde packages.
1) Little performance Improvements
2) Null checks to avoid NPEs
3) Effective varaible management.
item.environment: Hadoop 0.20.1, Hive0.7.0 and SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP2 (i586) - Kernel 2.6.16.60-0.21-smp (5).
item.summary: Few code improvements in the ql and serde packages.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Can you provide a review board request ?

-----------------------------------------------------------

Review request for hive.

Summary
-------

Few code improvements in the ql and serde packages.
1) Little performance Improvements
2) Null checks to avoid NPEs
3) Effective varaible management.

This addresses bug HIVE-2080.
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-2080

Diffs
